vars.name: customers
vars.expr: [{ id = 1; name = "Alice" }; { id = 2; name = "Bob" }; { id = 3; name = "Charlie" }; { id = 4; name = "Diana" }]

vars.name: orders
vars.expr: [{ id = 100; customerId = 1; total = 250 }; { id = 101; customerId = 2; total = 125 }; { id = 102; customerId = 1; total = 300 }]

vars.name: result
vars.expr: [ for c in customers do for o in orders do if (o.customerId) = (c.id) then yield { customerName = c.name; order = o } ]

then.expr: (String.concat " " [string "Customer"; string (entry.customerName); string "has order"; string (entry.order.id); string "- $"; string (entry.order.total)])
